page.title: 18THE VILLAGE IN THE PARK
page.content: The village is a lovely place where people who work in the park can live. It was developed in two stages: the old village near the Isle of Wight pond which was built at the time of Queen Victoria, and the new part built during the 1950's. About 250 people live there. It looks very pretty with a pond, in which the residents can fish, and a playground for the children. The quaint old Post Office near the village green is the only shop they have. There is a private White bus service which takes people to and from Windsor every day. The York Club is a general Sports Club which doubles as a Polling Station at the time of Elections. There is a bar there as well as facilities for many sports.
